author: lveldere
body:
this takes #12403 one step further

Using the fastsim era, all fastsim modifications to the standard MC configurations for mixing and digitization are applied inside the standard configuration files.

In this process a bug in the fastsim configuration for the L1 emulator:
In the case of premixing, ConfigBuilder loaded the standard L1 emulator,
instead of the one dedicated to premixing.
title: FastSim: use fastsim era to define customs to mixing (part2), includes fix to L1 emulator
